title: Design a URL Shortener
description: Design a service like TinyURL or bit.ly that takes a long URL and generates a short, unique alias for it.

title: Design a Messaging App
description: Design a real-time messaging service like WhatsApp or Telegram with features like one-on-one chat, group chat, and media sharing.

title: Design a Ride-Sharing Service
description: Design a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft that connects drivers with passengers.
